query1: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Department is "cpsc"; show Department and ID; sort in ascending order by ID.
query2: In rooms dataset rooms, find entries whose Seats is greater than 50 or Seats is not less than 50; show Name and Seats; sort in descending order by Name.
query3: In courses dataset courses grouped by Instructor, find entries whose Average is greater than 96 or Pass is not less than 1000; show Instructor and avgAVG and sumPass,where avgAVG is the AVG of Average and sumPass is the SUM of Pass;sort in descending order by Instructor.
query4: In rooms dataset rooms grouped by Type, find all entries; show Type and sumSeats, where sumSeats is the SUM of Seats.
query5: In rooms dataset rooms, find entries whose Type is "Studio Lab"; show Link and Name and Seats and Type.
